sentence.Network_en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to specify pilaster parameters.
sentence.Network_cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击以指定壁柱参数.

sentence.Network_en: Place over a wall section. Pilaster parameters can be specified.
sentence.Network_cn: 放在墙壁段上. 可指定壁柱参数.

sentence.Network_en: The pilaster and the wall between windows were strengthened with the enclosure steel method.
sentence.Network_cn: 加固壁柱和窗间墙采用外包钢加固法,加固屋面梁采用粘钢加固法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ... 9支架 shelves 10壁柱 pilasters 12天花板吊顶 ceiling sockets.
如将扶垛与立柱（COLUMNS）、半露柱（PILASTERS）或柱身（SHAFT）结合在一起，如在许多罗马式和哥特式教堂中出现的那样…

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from French pilastre, from Italian pilastro or medieval Latin pilastrum, from Latin pila 'pillar'

entry.def: Pilasters are shallow decorative pillars attached to a wall.

means.word_mean: 1. a rectangular column that usually projects about a third of its width from the wall to which it is attached
